reviewText: waited years for this DVD -- wished it were transposed into HD -- but wd take it anyway I could get it.  I saw the movie when I was a college freshman in the LA area.  It urged me to follow my dream to become an operatic singer -- I did and Thanks to Patrice Munsel who was always a down to earth lady with a fine voice and excellent acting skills, and to Mario Lanza and Kathryn Grayson.  These folks impacted my life and made me determined to become an operatic singer.
